      • setAlignment

        void setAlignment(IOhlcChartObject.OhlcAlignment alignment)
        Sets OhlcAlignment mode for this OHLC Informer. Use OhlcAlignment.AUTO to determine alignment automatically.
        Parameters:
        alignment - OhlcAlignment value.
